meanings.definition: The joint connecting the hand with the forearm.
meanings.sent1: She wore a bracelet on her wrist.
meanings.sent2: He felt pain in his wrist after playing tennis.
meanings.sent3: The watch on her wrist ticked loudly during the exam.
meanings.sent4: Her wrist was a bridge between delicate fingers and a strong arm.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's wrist moved gracefully as she performed.

meanings.definition: The part of a garment that covers the wrist.
meanings.sent1: His shirt had buttons at the wrist.
meanings.sent2: The sweater was too short, leaving her wrists exposed.
meanings.sent3: She rolled up her sleeves, revealing colorful wrist bands.
meanings.sent4: The jacket had elegant lace details at the wrist.
meanings.sent5: The gloves were designed to keep the wrists warm in winter.

meanings.definition: A blow delivered with the wrist.
meanings.sent1: He landed a powerful punch with his wrist.
meanings.sent2: The martial artist practiced various wrist strikes.
meanings.sent3: In the fight, she surprised her opponent with a swift wrist hit.
meanings.sent4: The boxer's victory came from a well-timed wrist jab.
meanings.sent5: His wrist strike was so quick, it caught everyone off guard.
